name: "Gamer"+ Crossroad of Sympathy
description:
The definitive   visual novel adaptation of the hit web comic  "Gamer" is here!

This definitive version  contains new narration not present in the original narrative, along with story changes such as a brand new Character.  "Gamer"+ features brilliant writing from JayMonoto, stunning art from Pencil Peach , and an almost entirely original soundtrack composed by Dunder-P. 

Check out the original  "Gamer" here!

Check out  "Gamer" 2 here!
